dialogues.speaker: King Arthur
dialogues.text: Welcome, brave knights! You are to embark on a perilous journey to retrieve the holy grail.

dialogues.speaker: Sir Lancelot
dialogues.text: I fear no danger, my King. I swear on my honor to bring back the grail.

dialogues.speaker: King Arthur
dialogues.text: Good fortune to you all. May your bravery and loyalty guide your path.

dialogues.speaker: Sir Galahad
dialogues.text: We shall not fail you, my King. We shall return victorious or not at all.
